review:
A Guiding Light on Our Journey to Parenthood: Dr. Ankita Gahlot's Exceptional Care

Rating: ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ (5/5)

Our IVF journey under the care of Dr. Ankita has been nothing short of extraordinary. Her commitment, compassion, and unwavering dedication throughout our experience have left an indelible mark on our hearts. From the moment we began this journey until we achieved success, Dr. Ankita's remarkable qualities as a fertility specialist shone brightly.

Dr. Ankita's responsiveness was unlike anything we've encountered in a medical professional. It was astonishing to receive her thoughtful responses within seconds, be it during office hours or beyond. This level of promptness and personalized attention not only made us feel valued but also alleviated any concerns we had along the way.

Her approachability and warm demeanor turned our medical appointments into meaningful conversations. Dr. Ankita took the time to thoroughly explain every step, ensuring we were well-informed and comfortable with the procedures. Her guidance was both professional and personal, creating an atmosphere of trust that significantly eased our journey.

Even amidst a mid-journey transition, Dr. Ankita's commitment to our well-being remained constant. She continued to provide guidance and support for up to three months after she left, showcasing her dedication and genuine concern for her patients' success.

Dr. Ankita's expertise is a cornerstone of her practice, and her caring nature amplifies its impact. She discussed all the procedures with us and valued our opinions. Her insights, strategies, and encouragement were instrumental in achieving our goal of parenthood.

Our gratitude extends to the entire team that supported us during this journey, but it is Dr. Ankita who truly stood as a guiding light. Her responsiveness, approachability, and unparalleled commitment have forever changed our lives. If you're searching for a fertility specialist who not only possesses exceptional expertise but also a heart full of compassion, Dr. Ankita is the one to entrust with your dreams of parenthood.
reply_text: Thank you for such kind words üòä

review: Dr Ankita is  very approachable and sweet in nature,. She gives comfort  which boost your  confident  during  time of treatment.  She always takes right decision . In my case She  suggested not to be hurry since I had ovarian cyst.  And before transfer of embryo took same decision which helped me to conceive in first transfer.  And  She is aways ready to support 24/7. *** ** *** ** *** ******* ****** * **** **** *****  I'll really recommend   someone who one to do infertility treatment should visit once Dr Ankita.

context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review:
I have consulted Dr.Ankita for my IVF treatment . She was very supportive from the beginning ,very approachable and encouraged hearing from us. During the procedure she made me comfortable and was very professional.  Now I am 3 months pregnant .I feel very happy that I have consulted Dr.Ankita not only due to her professionalism but also due to her friendly behaviour .

With lots of gratitude :-)

She is very approachable and sweet, give you comfort that you really need it during this time and gives you right guidance and support.

I have recommended and I will recommend her to the connections, family and friends. 

She is one of the great Droctors.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Gahlot was extremely polite, understanding and helpful. At times she was colloquial too, to ease the tension of the tests and that was greatly appreciated. There is a certain level of vulnerability attached to check ups with a gynaecologist and I think Dr Gahlot acknowledges that and tries to make the patient as relaxed as possible.

She is very approachable and sweet. Gives you so much comfort that you really need it during this time :) gives right guidance and support. I would personally recommend her and she is your go to person!!!

I was fortunate to have the opportunity to connect with Dr. Ankita when I was contemplating undergoing IVF. Her patience in addressing my questions, her unwavering positive attitude, and her ability to instill confidence in me were truly invaluable. Dr. Ankita dedicates ample time to each patient, never rushing through consultations, which ensures a high level of satisfaction and mental fortitude throughout the process, finally making it successful.

We are very happy to share  our experiences at archish hospital. Dr Ankita Gahlot is friendly,well experienced,and professionaldoctor. She used to listen to all our issues patiently and suggested all the possibilities.. we are happy that we got result within two months..Thankyou very much doctor.
Nice suggestion given by doctor . She clearly heard to all our problems and gave the treatment accordingly
****** ********* **** **** *** explained all problems but Fees very expensive  Please degrees the tests cost
